message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $9,500.  I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering its worth to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, based on my assessment, I am only willing to pay $9,000 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product offers you even more value than that. How about we meet in the middle at $9,250?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on this product, I would like to propose a price of $9,100. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.
